mapper.select: SELECT id, name, quantity, price, description, isNew, manufacturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, image, image_detail, d.percentage, d.discount_desc FROM product p, category c, discount d WHERE p.category_id = c.category_id AND p.discount_id = d.discount_id

SELECT id, name, quantity, price, description, isNew, manufacturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, image, image_detail, d.percentage, d.discount_desc FROM product p, category c, discount d WHERE p.category_id = c.category_id AND p.discount_id = d.discount_id LIMIT 6 OFFSET #{page}

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.quantity, p.price, p.description, p.isNew, p.manufacturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, image, image_detail, d.percentage, d.discount_desc, ds.id, ds.screen, ds.size, ds.resolution, ds.os, ds.camera, ds.chipset, ds.hardward FROM PRODUCT p, CATEGORY c, discount d, product_attribute ds WHERE p.id = #{id} AND p.category_id = c.category_id AND p.discount_id = d.discount_id AND p.details = ds.id

SELECT id, name, quantity, price, description, isNew, manufacturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, image, image_detail, d.percentage, d.discount_desc FROM PRODUCT p, CATEGORY c, discount d WHERE p.category_id = c.category_id AND p.discount_id = d.discount_id AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND c.category_id = #{category_id}

SELECT id, name, quantity, price, description, isNew, manufacturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, image, image_detail, d.percentage, d.discount_desc FROM PRODUCT p, CATEGORY c, DISCOUNT d WHERE c.category_name LIKE #{category_name} AND p.category_id = c.category_id AND p.discount_id = d.discount_id
